oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oriented strontium ferrite films sputtered onto SI(111)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ACHARYA, BR
PIRAMANAYAGAM, SN
AJAN, A
SHRINGI, SN
PRASAD, S
VENKATARAMANI, N
KRISHNAN, R
KULKARNI, SD
DATE, SK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hexaferrite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Recently we have shown that M-type Sr ferrite films (SrM) can be sputter deposited on fused amorphous quartz substrates with c-axis normal to the film plane [1]. In the present study we show that the c-axis orientation of SrM on Si(111) can be tailored to vary from in plane to normal to the film plane by changing the deposition parameters.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS,140,723-724
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Conference on Magnetism - ICM 94 (13th IUPAP Triennial Conference on Magnetism),WARSAW, POLAND,AUG 22-26, 1994
